content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: --BDSYCD
      operator: exists
    - name: --BODSYS
      operator: exists
    - name: --BDSYCD
      operator: is_not_unique_relationship
      value: --BODSYS
Core:
  Id: CORE-000184
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: There must be a one-to-one relationship between --BDSYSCD and --BODSYS
Outcome:
  Message: There is not a one-to-one relationship between --BODSYS and --BDSYSCD
  Output Variables:
    - --BODSYS
    - --BDSYCD
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Dataset
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0083
              Version: '2'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Events[--BODSYSCD][Variable Qualifier of BODSYS]
                Document: Model v2.0
                Item: --BODSYS
                Section: Events
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.3'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0083
              Version: '2'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Variable Qualifier of --BODSYS
                Document: Model v1.7
                Section: 2.2.2
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.2'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0083
              Version: '2'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Variable Qualifier of --BODSYS
                Document: Model v1.4
                Section: 2.2.2
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - EVENTS
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL

json.Description: There must be a one-to-one relationship between --BDSYSCD and --BODSYS

Outcome.Message: There is not a one-to-one relationship between --BODSYS and --BDSYSCD
